text: "Lady" is a 1980 song by country singer Kenny Rogers and it was taken from his 1980 album Greatest Hits. It was written by Lionel Richie. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada, number 3 in South Africa, number 6 in New Zealand, number 11 in France, number 12 in Ireland and the United Kingdom, number 16 in the Netherlands and Australia, number 17 in Belgium and number 19 in Spain. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Kenny Rogers songs
title: Lady (Kenny Rogers song)
